        Attempts to make the specified move and returns whether it's possible or not

        public boolean isValidMove(int x,
                           int y,
                           GameObject.Direction direction,
                           GameMap gameMap)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from class: GameObject
        This method takes coordinate representing a tile, the direction of intended travel and the current gameMap and discerns whether it is possible to move to that square based on consequential moves and what is contained at that location
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of tile intended to move to
        y - y coordinate of tile intended to move to
        direction - direction of travel
        gameMap - the current game state
